name: Barnabus the Stomper
text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of minions in your deck to (0).

name: Time Warp
text: Take an extra turn. (Once per game)

name: Crystal Core
text: For the rest of the game, your minions are 5/5.

name: Sulfuras
text: Battlecry: Your Hero Power becomes 'Deal 8 damage to a random enemy.'

name: Megafin
text: Battlecry: Fill your hand with random Murlocs.

name: Nether Portal
text: Open a permanent portal that summons 3/2 Imps.

name: Enter the Lost City
text: [x]Quest: Survive 10 turns. Reward: Latorvius, Gaze of the City.

name: Latorvius, Gaze of the City
text: [x]Battlecry: Get 2 random 'Journey to Un'Goro' Quest Rewards. Shuffle the rest into your deck.
